name: Skóli Lífsins - School Of Life
description:
A sequential flipbook about the beginning of a love story.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 This project was made for an Sequential Illustration I took in the summer semester of 2021, within in the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

The course was moderated by Hannan Brinkmann.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Download instructions:

Download the zip file provided on this page.

Once downloaded, right-click the file and select extract here/ or extract all.

Open the extracted folder and double click the .exe file, (named Skóli Lífsins).

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Enjoy! :D
